Subscription.Description: Events for additional LSA protection issues
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Wininit/Diagnostic"> <!-- Code Integrity events --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity'] and (EventID=3033 or EventID=3063 or EventID=3065 or EventID=3066)]] </Select> </Query>
<Query Id="1" Path="System"> <!-- Process startup events --> <Select Path="System"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Wininit'] and (EventID=12)]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
